title: That Moment When You See a Guy From Your Previous Game in Your New Queue
body:
http://imgur.com/ZGWpp1I.gif?noredirect

And it was the one guy who was a total dick, whom you hoped to never see ever again.

http://imgur.com/dllz1lP.gif?noredirect

And the moment when you remember it is a One For All and you can dodge with little to no consequences!

http://imgur.com/Npx5L3p.gif?noredirect

Edit: OMFG imgur is being retarded, if gifs aren't working, I blame that.

Edit2: Fixed it!

replies.body:
Lol, that reminds me of a Darius that I ended up in a queue with for the next three games in a row lol. 

He was a nice guy though, has would consistently wreck his lane opponent and push down top drawing attention away from other objectives.

Funny meme though, GJ.

One of my happiest in game moments was when one player on our team and I ended up in a fight because he raged constantly at someone on our team.

We left feeling distinctly unfriendly and hostile, and I reported him.

Guess who I see in my next champ select on my team.

I typed,"Hello, (guy's name), remember me?"

He then typed simply, "Oh, God, no." and then immediately after the little message popped up saying you have been removed from queue due to a player disconnecting from champ select...

I literally lol'd.

Everytime. You notice it's never one of those guys that were fun to play with or who were well mannered. It's always that one guy that spent the whole game trash talking you who shows up in your next game.
It's because matchmaking loves to troll people. Trundle was involved in the creation, I swear man.
Why I choose to wait 30 odd seconds to queue again. Less likely to match with previous people.
That sounds like something I'm going to have to start doing.
lol that last gift!
I bring gifts in the form of gifs!
K-On! Gifs turn me on
Of course they do, who DON'T they turn on?
Too Much Information
Actually, not enough information. http://i.imgur.com/nu5c8bI.jpg?1
you my friend are very typical earthling
http://i.imgur.com/UkxgHuk.gif?noredirect

One for all was fun, except for the times that everyone wants to pick things like {{champion:143}} last day when you can't play mages save your life.

Or you run into something annoying like {{champion:63}} ... uuuugh brand...
Zyra can be good if people know how to play her. Otherwise she is terribad. And yeah, I know the feeling of people wanting to pick dumb things.
Haha, at least it wasn't **FUCKING** taliyah.

{{champion:432}} 

OoOooOooOOooooo

Oh I got that. Versus vel'koz.

Was not a fun game (Especially since I went AD)
I was against ekko that game. My team told me to kite him. I have never been so mad at a video game before.
Kiting an ekko? Oh jesus christ.
Literally impossible unless you're like {{champion:81}} or something.

Lol, as I read the first part (and didn't see the second), I was thinking of posting how you then quickly check to make sure they weren't _that one guy_ who was on your team.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} nicely done
Huzzah, a compliment for a (relatively) novice memer!!
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Mkay. You seem like a pleasant person. /s
Also, see second gif.
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Lol, you salty we here at M&G are better than you at what you try and do with mmes?
lol kid you are what we call a cringey weeaboo you arent dank and dont know what memes are m8

http://i.imgur.com/DbHP7Q9.gif?noredirect
http://i.imgur.com/kyaLUJX.gif?noredirect
Also, you seem to have an unusual obsession with calling people who enjoy anime weeaboos. Learn what a term means before trying to use it. http://i.imgur.com/EXcJf58.gif?noredirect
Here, a helpful link that may enlighten your dark ages self a little: http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=weaboo  Hope that helps to educate you a little <3

this is what is wrong with league of legends we have a bunch of weeaboos like you running around picking braum and cancer beta champs who run around with their japanese names and project skins and have stupid disengage spells and play like beta males. you are common kid you are not special, one of millions of trash kids who kite and peel but stay in silver  because they dont know how to do the objectives and play the game. you are a 13-16 year old beta male who uses project ashe and spam w and stun enemies when they get close. 

also in the top gif my rage wouldve killed that girl because she cannot dodge bullets like that, she wouldve gotten shot and died. 1v1 me kid trash weeaboo ill deck you in the gabber and the hippocampus.

Ummmm, one, I can't stand playing Yasuo. Two, I find it HILARIOUS that you are talking about this stuff when I take a peek at your match history and see: YasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuoYasuo.
Three: You salty about getting curb stomped by someone playing Ashe or Braum recenty, I mean dang dude.
Four: Your lowballing on my age pretty hard there mate. And no, your rage couldn't have touched the gif because it's a character, not in reality. Learn to distinguish the two, for real.

http://imgur.com/N3nV4bW.gif?noredirect
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Yep, he salty.
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
http://i.imgur.com/ezMwmDA.gif?noredirect
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
http://i.imgur.com/tEpqNuO.gif?noredirect
weeaboo cancer go back to ponychan ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Yep, he's SUPER salty.

I had dodgers repeatedly in One for All and a duo also ending up on my team over and over for about 4 champion selects in a row, me saying 
hi again :D
over and over.
I didn't mind them being on my team every time, they wanted to play Braum and we ended up playing Braum as well because it's not such a bad pick and he's not commonly chosen in All for One, playing Yasuo and Zed over and over becomes dull.
So I voted Braum as well to make it a majority vote so the 2 Zed voters didn't stand a chance (if I remember correctly :p).
Braum is super fun, especially if a couple go AD and the rest go full tank. Plus, nope to the Zed I can't stand playing him in One for All.

To the thread about Teemo being banned by Riot from One for All I replied that Zed actually should be permabanned there because it's just lame, 5 Zed's, all you do is damage where's the fun in that?
The most fun matches for me were Rammus, Fiddlesticks and Braum in One for All.

Zed's so stupidly boring I'll permadodge that next time One for All is back.
Omg so fun a 5 times 1v1 (because that's Zed) with 0 synergy with eachother!
Nope.
Yep, I would love to see that implemented, but sadly it likely never will, because "Muh big git gud playz".
I think this may just be my single most viewed and up-voted thread yet. And it's not even 1k views and only 25 up-votes XD

Downvoted because dodging champ select is a huge dick move as it screws over 9 other people forcing them to wait another few minutes to play their game. If you dodge within the first 10 seconds, fine. But if you're one of those douchebags dodging on the last second, I fucking hate you.
Nah, I saw this dudes username and immediately jumped ship. Like, first 5 seconds fast.
